org.xbib.elasticsearch.support.client

Interface DocumentIngest

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Ingest
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractIngestClient, BulkClient, IngestClient, MockBulkClient, MockIngestClient, NodeClient

    public interface DocumentIngest
    Minimal API for document ingesting. Useful for river implementations.
